channel.title: Port
channel.description:
Okay, so I am trying to host my server with Hamachi, but the problem is that other people cant connect to the server, and does it have to do something with the port to do? Well I tried to login to the server with port 43594 on moparscapes client, and it didnt work, and i tried the port 90, and that worked, is there any way to change the port to 90?
Thanks, Alan.

item.title: Port
item.dc:creator: @awa006 awa006
item.description:
@awa006 wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:3, topic:412449”]if it worked then you changed it right?[/quote] I want it to work in the client, which it doesnt.
